commit.message:
Rollup merge of #98519 - TaKO8Ki:add-head-span-field-to-item-and-impl-item, r=cjgillot

Replace some `guess_head_span` with `def_span`

This patch fixes a part of #97417.
r? `@cjgillot`

verification.payload:
tree 51e22978d998483e8e98787b86522542ab2b8986
parent 4755173cf61dfd432d8fb96ea3d09da99fe30283
parent b730bc9f20d9f88972ad13ccdf88b56d8164aeb3
author Guillaume Gomez <guillaume1.gomez@gmail.com> 1657133004 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1657133004 +0200

Rollup merge of #98519 - TaKO8Ki:add-head-span-field-to-item-and-impl-item, r=cjgillot

Replace some `guess_head_span` with `def_span`

This patch fixes a part of #97417.
r? `@cjgillot`
